Description: A sweetheart evening gown features a full skirt. The sweetheart bodice is covered with colorful beading and sequins. The circular bead patterns cascade into the waistline of the gown. Beaded shoulder straps extend to the back of the bodice as well. Perfect for any school dance or elegant evening.
